Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
proceeds from payments for other financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
Repayment of Debt: repayments of long term lines of credit
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): escrow deposit heldby third party relatedto business acquisition
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
payments to acquire interest in subsidiaries and affiliates
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from sale and collection of notes receivable
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from maturities prepayments and calls of held to maturity securities
proceeds from repayments of commercial paper and long term lines of credit
proceeds from sale and maturity of held to maturity securities

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in capitalized contract costs net
increase decrease in contract with customer liability cash
increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decreasein contractwith customer liability cash
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on disposition of assets1
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
noncash restructuring and merger related costs
other operating activities cash flow statement

__unmapped__: noncash merger related and restructuring costs
